attributes.title: You are Blackmailing Yourself!
attributes.description:
Snippents from today's (25th February, 2014) morning Satsang of Paramahamsa Nithyananda 

Everyday life of human beings are not difficult as we made to believe . 
Success is never hard work. 
If you are working hard ,you will be a beggar only . 

Immediate Cognitions( IC ) 
 you have decides the quality of your life. 
 plays a major role . 
 
Your thinking , contemplation, analyzing , intranalysing , at the most can only influence the decision, they cannot be decisively decision making . 
 
Immediate Cognition you carry plays a MAJOR ROLE 
in IA , I am giving you the right immediate cogniton
- the IC goes on functioning in one way in your life , your contemplation goes on functioning in another way . the gap is called VASANA.
   you go on keeping your fantasy alive , you go on working on a different direction. .If I expose you to you , you bite me. 

Samskara / vasana - having the unconscious life pattern which is completely  against the reality you want to cause in your life. 
only if you make the person understand his Vasanas , you can speak into the listening of the person.
When mind is filled with vasana , listening can never happen. 

2014 02Feb 25 Morning Satsang of Paramahamsa Nithyananda
